trans-unit.source: Client for the Ctel "Payments Direct" credit card gateway.
trans-unit.target: Client for the Ctel "Payments Direct" credit card gateway.

trans-unit.source: It attempts to make working with the API feel pythonic, returning dictionaries in place of the native SOAP responses.
trans-unit.target: It attempts to make working with the API feel pythonic, returning dictionaries in place of the native SOAP responses.

trans-unit.source: This is a Python client for the Ctel “Payments Direct” SOAP API.
trans-unit.target: This is a Python client for the Ctel “Payments Direct” SOAP API.
